channel.title: HOW Do i Portforward and get a STATIC ip address or whatever?!
channel.description:
Well i have everything for my server done , but i need an up to date guide because , ever guide i tried it didnt work so yeah?
someone help me out please :)

@lildude783 wrote:

no… dude when u port forward… and use ur IP … it’ll port BLOCK u … so u have to use the IP 0.0.0.0 …

i run a uTorrent now and i HAVE to use ip 0.0.0.0 but other ppl will uses ur ip

item.title: HOW Do i Portforward and get a STATIC ip address or whatever?!
item.dc:creator: @_Owns !~Owns~!
item.description:
@_Owns wrote:

Ok , i done all the port forwarding but , When i go into my client and i try to log in , i cant change the IP , but i did change the ip to crazyfaze.no-ip.info , it says my port is open and stuff but when i go to log in it says Server is down and stuff.

I Think i changed the IP in the wrong place.

Read full topic
item.source: HOW Do i Portforward and get a STATIC ip address or whatever?!

item.title: HOW Do i Portforward and get a STATIC ip address or whatever?!
item.dc:creator: @co_pked co pked
item.description:
@co_pked wrote:

1.) Go to http://portforward.com
2.) Scroll Down, Find What Type Of Internet You Got
3.) Click The 1 You Have
4.) Scroll Down, And It Will Show You How To PortFoward It.

Co Pked

Read full topic
